about_the_game:
Mothman is a phycological horror game in which you and up to three other players seek down and hunt a sinister demon known as Mothman. Your goal is to kill the demon, it is the only way you will survive. You have gone deep in the woods of Point Pleasant, West Virginia, USA armed with guns and traps in order to finally kill this monster. You must hunt down Mothman while ensuring you remain quiet, stealthy, and agile. You will have to determine when to take action, and when to avoid conflict.

Multiplayer

- Fully supports up to 4 player co-op giving you the ability to hunt together.

Performance

- Designed to run on low end systems, and on high end systems supporting both extreme graphic fidelity or lower quality graphics.

Hunting

- This is a monster you can not run up to with a gun and kill it. You will need to utilize different items and techniques to successfully execute a plan to kill this demon while also ensuring to stay alive. Using traps, range, and bait a plan can be executed to complete the task.

name: Mothman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: I9 9400K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: I9 9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A 1-4 player CO-OP horror game, a nightmare from hell, it is your objective to hunt down a sinister demon known as Mothman. Underequipped you must search the landscape for resources. Lay bear traps, stalk from a distance, and stay quiet. You came to hunt, only to be hunted.
